mapper.select: SELECT f.taskfilename AS "taskfile.taskfilename", f.taskfileurl AS "taskfile.taskfileurl", t.creator_userid AS creator_userid, t.operator_userid AS operator_userid FROM t_taskfile f JOIN t_task t ON ( f.taskfileid = #{taskfileid} AND f.taskid = t.taskid )
SELECT taskfileid, taskfilename, taskfileurl FROM t_taskfile WHERE taskid = #{taskid}
